ygData.subject: Re: Cheap Rivervale Merchants
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I give... can you send me some recipes for stuff I don t have, or clue me in as to where to get them??? I am up to 135 in brewing, with the ones I have.
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I give...

can you send me some recipes for stuff I don't have, or clue me in as to
where to get them???
I am up to 135 in brewing, with the ones I have.

Short Beer Short Ale Ale Mead
Fiery Brew Ogre Swill Tumpy Tonic

So, I can make 7 brews, at this time. I've heard of a few others:
Bog Juice (?)
Gypsy Wine
Fish Wine
Red Wine
White Wine
(Something made from Honey Jum)

Oh, and will any of these push brewing skill past 135?

I appreciate it!

MacGrough
14th Song Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers
ddane@...

At 09:09 PM 7/7/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: weya <weya@...>
>
>Oh, the prices I'm getting paid for fire beetle eyes is barely over 1
>silver a piece ... so I know I'm getting gipped. I know I got more for
>the same thing in Freeport from the bard guild.


Ummm, save those Fire Beetle Eyes and sell them to brewers for around 2sp.
They are used in the making of Gypsy Wine 8)



------------------------------------------------------------------------
Albereth - 20th Circle Halfling Druid
Master Brewer
The Arcane Order
Mithaniel Marr Server
------------------------------------------------------------------------
